abstract: Part of the Treasury’s goal was to clamp down on earnings stripping. But many multinationals with no history of inversions were affected by the rules as well.
snippet: Part of the Treasury’s goal was to clamp down on earnings stripping. But many multinationals with no history of inversions were affected by the rules as well.
lead_paragraph: After the Treasury Department announced new rules in April restricting companies from using certain tax-reduction strategies, the protests rang out loudly. Business lobbying groups, executives, tax experts and lawmakers argued that they went too far.

headline.main: Companies Hurt by Treasury Crackdown Win Exemptions
headline.print_headline: Firms Hurt by Crackdown by Treasury Win Pardons
